autumn.util

Class Bitwise

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.util.Bitwise

  • public final class Bitwise
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides bitwise manipulations, since the language does not have bitwise operators.

    Warning: This class is still under development.

      • shiftLeft

        public static long shiftLeft(long bits,
             int count)
        This method performs a bitwise left-shift operation.
        Parameters:
        bits - contains the bits to shift.
        count - is the distance of the shift.
        Returns:
        the bits shifted by the specified distance.
